dmca.title: [ABUSE] [eBay:YCO05X503] Inappropriate and fraudulent use of copyrighted materials
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 21, 2005 9:57 AM
To: mdhudson@ebay.com
Cc: lance@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] [eBay:YCO05X503] Inappropriate and fraudulent use of
copyrighted materials

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/

mec> Dear ThePlanet.com,

mec> We have just learned that your service is being used to violate eBay
mec> Inc.'s trademarks and/or copyrights.  Specifically, it appears that
mec> a ThePlanet.com user is hosting a page at
mec> http://shmeebay.com/forum/register.php which uses our
mec> trademarks inappropriately.

mec> While we believe that the above information gives your company more
mec> than a sufficient basis for disabling the page immediately, out of
mec> caution we note that your user?s unauthorized reproduction of eBay?s
mec> trademark and copyrighted materials violates federal law, and places
mec> an independent legal obligation on your company to remove the
mec> offending page(s) immediately upon receiving notice from eBay, the
mec> owner of the copyrighted materials. Accordingly, the information
mec> below serves as eBay?s notice of infringement pursuant to the Digital
mec> Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C. Section 512 (c)(3)(A):

mec> I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the
mec> agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain
mec> intellectual property rights, said owner being named eBay Inc. I have
mec> a good faith belief that the website located at URL
mec> http://shmeebay.com/forum/register.php has
mec> its copyright in each page of its website and associated source code.
mec> Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material
mec> or items claimed to be infringing.

mec> We sincerely appreciate your immediate attention to this important
mec> matter. We would also appreciate if you would take steps to confirm
mec> the accuracy of any contact information that your user may have
mec> provided to you in establishing the account. Should you have any
mec> accurate information that could assist eBay and law enforcement in
mec> tracking this individual, we greatly appreciate your assistance, as
mec> we know that you do not condone the use of your services for such
mec> criminal purposes.

mec> Finally, please be advised that we have referred this issue to the
mec> Federal Bureau of Investigation for their investigation.  The F.B.I.
mec> has requested that we convey to you in this message their request
mec> that you preserve for 90 days all records relating to this web site,
mec> including all associated accounts, computer logs, files, IP
mec> addresses, telephone numbers, subscriber and user records,
mec> communications, and all programs and files on storage media in regard
mec> to all Internet connection information, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. ?
mec> 2703(f). While we do not act as an agent of the FBI in conveying this
mec> request, we do intend to fully cooperate with their investigation,
mec> and encourage you to do so as well.
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFB8SZavK/XpJs6oyURAqujAJ9X+UVaiVKiAFiYKjbcBao7TvLgiQCginKK
owasWHyITDum5fdjXRkcM9A=
=Ah1A
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
